TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Rfc2898DeriveBytes extends System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes

summary.span: 依據 使用虛擬亂數產生器，實作密碼式的金鑰衍生功能 PBKDF2。

span.span: Implements password-based key derivation functionality, PBKDF2, by using a pseudo-random number generator based on .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接受密碼、 salt 和反覆計數，並接著會產生金鑰，透過呼叫方法。 takes a password, a salt, and an iteration count, and then generates keys through calls to the method. RFC 2898 包含密碼和 salt，建立索引鍵和初始化向量 (IV) 的方法。RFC 2898 includes methods for creating a key and initialization vector (IV) from a password and salt. 您可以使用 PBKDF2，密碼為基礎的金鑰衍生函式，來衍生金鑰使用似隨機函式，可讓要產生的幾乎無限制長度的金鑰。You can use PBKDF2, a password-based key derivation function, to derive keys using a pseudo-random function that allows keys of virtually unlimited length to be generated. 類別可以用來產生衍生的金鑰的基底的索引鍵與其他參數。The class can be used to produce a derived key from a base key and other parameters. 密碼為基礎的金鑰衍生函式中的基底的索引鍵是密碼，而其他參數則 salt 值和反覆項目計數。In a password-based key derivation function, the base key is a password and the other parameters are a salt value and an iteration count. 如需 PBKDF2 的詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2898，"PKCS #5:Password-based Cryptography Specification Version 2.0，」 上可用[註解的網站要求](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119)。For more information about PBKDF2, see RFC 2898, "PKCS #5: Password-Based Cryptography Specification Version 2.0," available on the [Request for Comments Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119). 完整的詳細資訊，請參閱區段 5.2，"PBKDF2"。See section 5.2, "PBKDF2," for complete details. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。Never hard-code a password within your source code. 可以從組件擷取硬式編碼的密碼，利用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)、 使用十六進位編輯器，或只開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly by using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), by using a hexadecimal editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用類別來建立兩個相同的金鑰類別。The following code example uses the class to create two identical keys for the class. 然後，它會加密並解密相同的索引鍵的資料。It then encrypts and decrypts some data using the keys. [!code-cpp[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CPP/rfc28981.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CS/rfc28981.cs#1)] [!code-vb[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/vb/rfc28981.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用密碼和 Salt 來衍生金鑰，以初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using a password and salt to derive the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Salt 大小必須是 8 個位元組或更大。The salt size must be 8 bytes or larger. RFC 2898 包含密碼和 salt，建立索引鍵和初始化向量 (IV) 的方法。RFC 2898 includes methods for creating a key and initialization vector (IV) from a password and salt. 您可以使用 PBKDF2，密碼為基礎的金鑰衍生函式，來衍生金鑰使用似隨機函式，可讓要產生的幾乎無限制長度的金鑰。You can use PBKDF2, a password-based key derivation function, to derive keys using a pseudo-random function that allows keys of virtually unlimited length to be generated. 類別可以用來產生衍生的金鑰的基底的索引鍵與其他參數。The class can be used to produce a derived key from a base key and other parameters. 密碼為基礎的金鑰衍生函式中的基底的索引鍵是密碼，而其他參數則 salt 值和反覆項目計數。In a password-based key derivation function, the base key is a password and the other parameters are a salt value and an iteration count. 如需 PBKDF2 的詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2898，"PKCS #5:Password-based Cryptography Specification Version 2.0，」 上可用[註解的網站要求](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119)。For more information about PBKDF2, see RFC 2898, "PKCS #5: Password-Based Cryptography Specification Version 2.0," available on the [Request for Comments Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119). 完整的詳細資訊，請參閱區段 5.2，"PBKDF2"。See section 5.2, "PBKDF2," for complete details. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。Never hard-code a password within your source code. 可以從組件擷取硬式編碼的密碼，利用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)、 使用十六進位編輯器，或只開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly by using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), by using a hexadecimal editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用類別來建立兩個相同的金鑰類別。The following code example uses the class to create two identical keys for the class. 然後，它會加密並解密相同的索引鍵的資料。It then encrypts and decrypts some data using the keys. [!code-cpp[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CPP/rfc28981.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CS/rfc28981.cs#1)] [!code-vb[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/vb/rfc28981.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定的 Salt 大小小於 8 個位元組，或反覆計數小於 1。

span.span: The specified salt size is smaller than 8 bytes or the iteration count is less than 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Salt 大小必須是 8 個位元組或更大。The salt size must be 8 bytes or larger. RFC 2898 包含密碼和 salt，建立索引鍵和初始化向量 (IV) 的方法。RFC 2898 includes methods for creating a key and initialization vector (IV) from a password and salt. 您可以使用 PBKDF2，密碼為基礎的金鑰衍生函式，來衍生金鑰使用似隨機函式，可讓要產生的幾乎無限制長度的金鑰。You can use PBKDF2, a password-based key derivation function, to derive keys using a pseudo-random function that allows keys of virtually unlimited length to be generated. 類別可以用來產生衍生的金鑰的基底的索引鍵與其他參數。The class can be used to produce a derived key from a base key and other parameters. 密碼為基礎的金鑰衍生函式中的基底的索引鍵是密碼，而其他參數則 salt 值和反覆項目計數。In a password-based key derivation function, the base key is a password and the other parameters are a salt value and an iteration count. 如需 PBKDF2 的詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2898，"PKCS #5:Password-based Cryptography Specification Version 2.0，」 上可用[註解的網站要求](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119)。For more information about PBKDF2, see RFC 2898, "PKCS #5: Password-Based Cryptography Specification Version 2.0," available on the [Request for Comments Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119). 完整的詳細資訊，請參閱區段 5.2，"PBKDF2"。See section 5.2, "PBKDF2," for complete details. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。Never hard-code a password within your source code. 可以從組件擷取硬式編碼的密碼，利用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)、 使用十六進位編輯器，或只開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly by using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), by using a hexadecimal editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe.

summary.span: 使用密碼、Salt 和反覆計數來衍生金鑰，以初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using a password, a salt, and number of iterations to derive the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Salt 大小必須是 8 個位元組或更大且反覆項目計數必須小於或等於零。The salt size must be 8 bytes or larger and the iteration count must be greater than zero. 反覆項目的最小建議的數目是 1000年。The minimum recommended number of iterations is 1000. RFC 2898 包含密碼和 salt，建立索引鍵和初始化向量 (IV) 的方法。RFC 2898 includes methods for creating a key and initialization vector (IV) from a password and salt. 您可以使用 PBKDF2，密碼為基礎的金鑰衍生函式，來衍生金鑰使用似隨機函式，可讓要產生的幾乎無限制長度的金鑰。You can use PBKDF2, a password-based key derivation function, to derive keys using a pseudo-random function that allows keys of virtually unlimited length to be generated. 類別可以用來產生衍生的金鑰的基底的索引鍵與其他參數。The class can be used to produce a derived key from a base key and other parameters. 密碼為基礎的金鑰衍生函式中的基底的索引鍵是密碼，而其他參數則 salt 值和反覆項目計數。In a password-based key derivation function, the base key is a password and the other parameters are a salt value and an iteration count. 如需 PBKDF2 的詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2898，"PKCS #5:Password-based Cryptography Specification Version 2.0，」 上可用[註解的網站要求](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119)。For more information about PBKDF2, see RFC 2898, "PKCS #5: Password-Based Cryptography Specification Version 2.0," available on the [Request for Comments Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119). 完整的詳細資訊，請參閱區段 5.2，"PBKDF2"。See section 5.2, "PBKDF2," for complete details. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。Never hard-code a password within your source code. 可以從組件擷取硬式編碼的密碼，利用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)、 使用十六進位編輯器，或只開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly by using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), by using a hexadecimal editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此函式是 Crypto API 函式 CryptDeriveKey()，包裝函式，要提供與使用 Crypto API 的應用程式的互通性。This function is a wrapper for the Crypto API function CryptDeriveKey(), and is intended to offer interoperability with applications using the Crypto API. 如果`keySize`參數設為 0 位元，使用指定的演算法的預設金鑰大小。If the `keySize` parameter is set to 0 bits, the default key size for the specified algorithm is used.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);
override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示會同時釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 類別所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 當覆寫，請小心不要參考先前處置呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊並，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

param.name: cb
param.span: 要產生的虛擬隨機金鑰位元組數量。

span.span: The number of pseudo-random key bytes to generate.

summary.span: 傳回這個物件的虛擬隨機金鑰。

span.span: Returns the pseudo-random key for this object.

returns.span: 位元組陣列，以虛擬隨機金鑰位元組填入。

span.span: A byte array filled with pseudo-random key bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作 PBKDF2 功能使用虛擬亂數產生器根據。The class implements PBKDF2 functionality by using a pseudorandom number generator based on . 類別會使用密碼、 salt 和反覆計數，並接著會產生金鑰，透過呼叫方法。The class takes a password, a salt, and an iteration count, and then generates keys through calls to the method. 重複的呼叫這個方法不會產生相同的金鑰;相反地，附加的兩個呼叫方法`cb`參數值`20`相當於呼叫方法一次使用`cb`參數值的`40`。Repeated calls to this method will not generate the same key; instead, appending two calls of the method with a `cb` parameter value of `20` is the equivalent of calling the method once with a `cb` parameter value of `40`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來取得的執行個體的索引鍵。The following example shows how to use the method to get the key for an instance of . 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[rfc28981#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CPP/rfc28981.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[rfc28981#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CS/rfc28981.cs#2)] [!code-vb[rfc28981#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/vb/rfc28981.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定操作的重複次數。

The number of iterations for the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 反覆項目計數是在執行作業的次數。Iteration count is the number of times an operation is performed. 針對這個方法的計數必須小於或等於零。For this method, the count should be greater than zero. 反覆項目的最小建議的數目是 1000年。The minimum recommended number of iterations is 1000. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用反覆項目中產生的金鑰使用的數字顯示的屬性。The following example shows how to use the property to display the number of iterations used in the generation of the key. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[rfc28981#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CPP/rfc28981.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[rfc28981#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CS/rfc28981.cs#3)] [!code-vb[rfc28981#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/vb/rfc28981.vb#3)]

span.span: The number of iterations is less than 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已修改的 salt 或反覆項目計數，會自動呼叫這個方法。This method is automatically called if the salt or iteration count is modified. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: public byte[] Salt { get; set; }
.property instance unsigned int8[] Salt
Public Property Salt As Byte()

member this.Salt : byte[] with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定用於操作的金鑰 Salt 值。

span.span: Gets or sets the key salt value for the operation.

value.span: 用於操作的金鑰 Salt 值。

span.span: The key salt value for the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Salt，一組隨機位元組，可讓未經授權的解密訊息更困難。Salt, a random set of bytes, is used to make unauthorized decrypting of a message more difficult. 字典攻擊是攻擊者嘗試藉由比較最可能的索引鍵的先前計算的加密值的加密的值解密加密的訊息。A dictionary attack is an attack in which the attacker attempts to decrypt an encrypted message by comparing the encrypted value with previously computed encrypted values for the most likely keys. 這種攻擊會藉由引進的 salt，或隨機位元組，結尾的密碼，才能進行金鑰衍生更為困難。This attack is made much more difficult by the introduction of salt, or random bytes, at the end of the password before the key derivation.

exception.span: 指定的 Salt 大小小於 8 個位元組。

span.span: The specified salt size is smaller than 8 bytes.
The salt is .
